issue.title: [CF 737] Cooldown of vehicle ability
issue.body:
Is there a way to check the cooldown of an ability the player receives when controlling a vehicle or being possessed?  Preferably also through a lua condition. This could be really helpful for Amber-Shaper Un'sok.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #737 | Raw

comments.body:
Try tracking it as a multi-state cooldown. That is all I can think of since I'm cant find any API for vehicle cooldowns.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
